net.rim.device.api.io.parser.soap
Class SOAPEnvelope

java.lang.Object
  net.rim.device.api.io.parser.soap.SOAPElement
      net.rim.device.api.io.parser.soap.SOAPEnvelope

public class SOAPEnvelope
extends SOAPElement

Root object in the SOAP object model. It contains a header and a body, which may contain other SOAP elements.

Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a SOAPEnvelope.

getVersion

public int getVersion()
Returns the SOAP version. Supported versions are defined as constants in the SOAPConstants class. Currently supports these versions:
  • SOAPConstants.VERSION_1_1
  • SOAPConstants.VERSION_1_2

Returns:
SOAP version.
See Also:
SOAPConstants
Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

setVersion

public void setVersion(int version)
Updates the SOAP version for this envelope. Supported versions are defined as constants in the SOAPConstants class. Currently supports these versions:
  • SOAPConstants.VERSION_1_1
  • SOAPConstants.VERSION_1_2

Parameters:
version - SOAP version.
See Also:
SOAPConstants
Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

getStyle

public int getStyle()
Returns the SOAP style. Supported versions are defined as constants in the SOAPConstants class. Currently supports these versions:
  • SOAPConstants.RPC_ENCODED
  • SOAPConstants.DOCUMENT_LITERAL

Returns:
The SOAP style.
Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

setStyle

public void setStyle(int style)
Updates the SOAP version for this envelope.Supported versions are defined as constants in the SOAPConstants class. Currently supports these versions:
